name: Highway Moto Traffic Rider
description:
You will have a lot of fun with this amazing motorbike game that will mark the year 2017 and give you a real motorbike riding experience. Different beautiful motorcycles, different roads, different maps, day and night modes, snowy roads, changeable engines and more.

You are left to enjoy the wind, you will experience a spectacular motorbike ride with eye-camera view. Realistic engine sounds, challenging tasks, unlimited modes and more.

Go for higher points at high speed, overtake cars, go through the reverse lanes and scissors. See your world rankings and country rankings with the scores you get.

Modify your engine, use it faster, do more series of maneuvers.

Play with great effects on high-end phones with HD graphic quality. Enjoy driving with the Highway Moto Traffic Rider.

We are claiming to be the most popular riding simulation of 2017, so try our Highway Moto Traffic Rider game.

FEATURES

- 4 different roads and seasons

- Different engines

- Night and Day Mode

- Increased realistic use

- Seasons (Snowy Mode, Summer Mode)

- 45 Missions
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
